attributes.action: create a national holiday to recognise the occasion that Corinne MacKenzie got out of bed first to deal with her 2 year old.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This important occasion, where Corinne MacKenzie allowed her husband to stay in bed for the first time, should be a source of pride and inspiration for the nation.  Despite her husband waking early EVERY morning to play/dress/feed/entertain their son, this altuistic act must not be ignored.  Please add your name to this petition, and help the "Corinne got up early bank holiday" to become reality.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
